woocommerce.select: SELECT ID, post_author, post_date, post_date_gmt, post_content, post_title, post_excerpt, post_status, comment_status, ping_status, post_password, post_name, to_ping, pinged, post_modified, post_modified_gmt, post_content_filtered, post_parent, guid, menu_order, post_type, post_mime_type, comment_count FROM 165_22_186_58.wp_posts WHERE ID=?;
woocommerce.update: UPDATE 165_22_186_58.wp_posts SET post_status=?, post_modified=?, post_modified_gmt=? WHERE ID=?;

orders.selectOrdersPosts: SELECT * FROM 165_22_186_58.wp_posts p WHERE  p.post_type ='shop_order' AND p.post_status='wc-pending' ORDER BY p.ID
orders.selectRestaurants: SELECT * FROM 165_22_186_58.wp_posts p WHERE p.post_type='restaurants' ORDER BY p.ID
